string-array.name: help_string_array_questions
string-array.item: Why is the menu not updated?
Where do they get Balance and Meter information?
Why need permission of internet and camera?
What\'s mean \"Barcode dependencies are not yet available.\"?
Do I need internet to check my card balance?

string-array.name: help_string_array_answers
string-array.item:
We are two FaMAF students with very hungry.

 	The app started just as a hobby to learn the Java/Android programming language, so we strive to polish it as much as we can in our free time.

 Development: Alejandro Ismael Silva
 		alex.sai95@gmail.com

 Icon, banner and a multitude of opinions: Julieta Wiesztort
 		juli.nana.07@gmail.com

We get the menu of the university web:

 www.unc.edu.ar/vida-estudiantil/men%C3%BA-de-la-semana

 	If the menu isn't refresh must be because the university did not update it.

From the webs of the university dining room:

 	Balance: comedor.unc.edu.ar/autoconsulta.php

 	Meter: comedor.unc.edu.ar/cocina.php
\tThe internet permission is necessary to update the menu, the balance and the measurer.\n \tThe camera permission is for add the card by scanning the barcode.

\tTo add a card using the camera, we use the \"Vision\" library of Google Play Services. If this library is not available on the device, it will be downloaded automatically in background (Keep in mind that you need storage space available for download, if you don\'t have enough, a warning will appear).\n\n \tTry again after a few minutes. If you are hurry or don\'t have Google Play Services, you can add it manually by entering the code with the keyboard.
\tAll data is stored on the device to consults offline, but you need to be connected to the internet to update them.

If you are developer, you can collaborate with code in the Github repository:
 		github.com/AIDEA775/UNCmorfi

 	If you have a suggestion or doubt, you can send it by e-mail in the "Contact" option of the navigation bar menu.

 	Otherwise, you can recommend the app to anyone you see in the dining room row ;)
